video_title: Stop Letting Your Emotions Decide Your Actions
transcript:
this is a core tenant by the way of
stoicism in Sanskrit that's called
vairagya to detach from your life right
to recognize that you as a human being
are independent of all that crap out
there because the moment that your
emotions and your worth gets tied into
it you surrender the control of like
your effort and your ability to like set
limits on things then what happens is
you end up burning out right because now
you're like devoting a hundred percent
effort for like a promotion that comes
with a 10 raise and then you don't get
it and now you're like well screw it why
did I do all that crap anyway and then
you feel bad about yourself and then you
vow to yourself that you should quit and
never again and now I'm going to join
the anti-work movement and then you
become resentful but even that is the
same problem because you are still
letting your resentment dictate your
actions as long as your emotions are
dictating your actions you're in big
trouble
